name: WALLACE (LauritzS, Felipe Versick, Timurl2602)
description:
WALLACE (Demo) is a text based game that explores the question — How far can we trust and rely on machines?

Story:
Sometime in the future. You and your four crew members are on a space mission to Saturn's moon Titan to bring supplies to an outpost there. Also on board: The AI named WALLACE, whose job it is to monitor and advise on everything that happens on the spaceship. Since a human being must always be present for that too, all crew members work in shifts to keep an eye on things together with WALLACE. When the game starts, you are just beginning your shift...

Participants:
We, Felipe Versick, Timur Lüdemann, Steven Cline and Lauritz Sammann are first semester Game Design Students at the University of Applied Sciences Europe in Hamburg. This was our first gamejam!
